game.name: Little Toys
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: What if toys came to life and escaped from our drawers for crazy, over-the-top races? Up to 4 players in local multiplayer, 16 maps, traps, powers, podiums, and LittleFlouz to unlock. Challenge your friends and your family! An explosive, hilariously frustrating couch-party game.
